title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.40 - Merge Signs (W4-1, W4-5)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.40 - Merge Signs (W4-1, W4-5)

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 02. INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 03A Merge signs (W4-1, W4-5) should not be used on a minor
roadway or entrance ramp where such roadway or ramp merges with a major
roadway. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.40

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
